name: Silence Notes
description:
《Silence Notes 》is a third-person action adventure game with novel game modes, realistic model movements and exciting game process. The game is divided into three levels. In the first level, players need to collect five notes, which are scattered throughout the game scene. The second level is the parkour mode, the player needs to escape the big demon king's chase to reach the end point smoothly; The third level is maze mode. Players need to successfully walk through the maze and find a white Npc to win.
WASD controls the task
